Posts.Content: Aug 5, 2010 08:02PM Oddball1 wrote: I had some photos taken recently and it was fun!  Two women photographers I trusted with my images took them for me.  They did wonders with the lighting/editing...getting rid of cellulite...thumbs up..... and I thought they looked better than I expected.  I never thought of myself doing something like that but wanted to capture what God gave me before I have my PBM.  I don't know how I will feel.  Sad when I look at them afterward, or glad I did it.  Many women think after a "tummy tuck" surgery and slightly larger enhancement, I may like my after shots better.  I sure hope so....I plan to do after shots later when my scars fade, but like someone said, I can always shred them but I can't go back in time, so I felt comfortable dong this and saw nothing wrong with it, as a Christian.  I do not plan to share with anyone but my husband and myself.  He was very happy I did them by the way.  And, some conservative friends raised their eyebrows but they are not walking in my shoes.
Posts.Title: Nude/Topless Photo Shoot Anne068 Oddball1

Posts.Content: Jul 8, 2010 01:03AM Oddball1 wrote: Praying right now that it is benign.  Please pray for me as well.  Had MRI and may need biopsy....trying to figure it out.  Did your enhancement show up on ultrasound or not??
Posts.Title: MRI core biopsy yesterday...very sore. Chancesmom Kate33
